metadata.title: Learn FB15K Data Set with HolE as described by Nickel et al., 2016
metadata.comments: We use same setting as for WN18 (based on https://github.com/mnick/holographic-embeddings/blob/master/run_hole_wn18.sh, however it is not sure whether this is the correct setting) since we couln't find the setting for FB15k.
